ch0133_91_shilver/0101_0701_02_10:
If you want to train, I can help. But don’t
expect me to go easy on you.
ch0133_91_shilver/7101_0701_01_10:
I’m pretty satisfied with the new power from
my arc suit...
ch0133_91_shilver/7101_0701_02_10: except for the fact that Ethan has one too.
ch0133_91_shilver/7101_0701_03_10:
Hmph! Then I’ll have to be one step ahead
of him!
ch0133_91_shilver/7102_0701_01_10:
Since arriving on this island, I think I’ve had
more time to spend with my Pokémon.
ch0133_91_shilver/7102_0701_02_10:
Maybe that’s why Ho-Oh and I were able to
awaken my arc suit.
ch0133_91_shilver/7103_0701_01_10:
According to legend, those who see Ho-Oh
are promised happiness. I guess they
were right.
ch0133_91_shilver/7103_0701_02_10:
At the very least, I think I’m stronger than I
was before.
ch0133_91_shilver/7103_0701_03_10: But I don’t know if Ho-Oh’s happy.
ch0133_91_shilver/7104_0701_01_10:
Awakening my arc suit doesn’t automatically
make me the best.
ch0133_91_shilver/7104_0701_02_10:
I have to get stronger with all of my
Pokémon...
ch0133_91_shilver/7104_0701_03_10: then train my heart until it’s strong, too!
ch0133_91_shilver/7105_0701_01_10:
I hate to admit it, but at this point, it’s
difficult to get stronger all by myself.
ch0133_91_shilver/7105_0701_02_10:
That doesn’t mean I’m gonna start being
all chummy with everyone, though!
ch0133_91_shilver/7105_0701_04_10:
Don’t forget that you and Ethan are just
stepping stones to make me stronger!
ch0133_91_shilver/1701_0701_01_10:
Perfect timing. Here, I have something
for you.
ch0133_91_shilver/1701_0702_01_10:
I’m strong, so I can afford to give you
that. Just accept it and be grateful.
ch0133_91_shilver/2501_0701_01_10:
Apparently, arc suits are outfits that have
been blessed by Arceus and transformed.
ch0133_91_shilver/2501_0701_02_10:
I’m not a fan of someone else deciding what
I wear, but I can’t do much about it.
ch0133_91_shilver/2501_0702_01_10: Arceus is known as the deified Pokémon.
ch0133_91_shilver/2501_0702_02_10:
I’m not sure what kind of Pokémon it is, but
if it starts acting all high and mighty, it could
be fun to knock it down a notch or two.
ch0133_91_shilver/2501_0702_03_10:
One day, we’ll surpass it—even if it is a
deity.
ch0133_91_shilver/2511_0701_01_10: I finally started to realize something.
ch0133_91_shilver/2511_0701_02_10: Battling with my Pokémon is fun.
ch0133_91_shilver/2511_0701_03_10:
Looking back...you, Ethan, and Lance always
looked like you were having fun when
battling.
ch0133_91_shilver/2511_0702_01_10: But there’s no point in having fun if you lose.
ch0133_91_shilver/2511_0702_02_10:
My goal always has and always will be
becoming the world’s greatest Trainer.
Make no mistake!
ch0133_91_shilver/3001_0701_01_10:
You’re the first person I’ve run into today.
Perfect. Saves me some trouble.
ch0133_91_shilver/3003_0701_01_10:
A deity may still be watching and judging
us, even now.
ch0133_91_shilver/3005_0701_01_10:
Working your Pokémon till they pass out
won’t do you any good. Let them rest
sometimes.
